p:
2011-12-28 20:45:59 : SQL Instruction -
method load SELECT * FROM ninja LEFT JOIN ataques_ninja as atN ON atN.ninja_id = ninja.id LEFT JOIN ataques as at ON at.id = atN.ataques_id LEFT JOIN elemento as el ON el.id = at.elemento_id LEFT JOIN pais as p ON ninja.pais_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ataques_ninja as atN ON atN.ninja_id = ninja.id LEFT JOIN ataques as at ON at.id = atN.ataques_id LEFT JOIN elemento as el ON el.id = at.elemento_id LEFT JOIN pais as p ON ninja.pais_id = p.id WHERE (ninja.idade > :idade) ORDER BY ninja.id desc LIMIT 10
